endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: cfg

param_schema.title: Cfg
param_schema.description: The guidance scale tells the model how similar the output should be to the prompt.

parameters.description: The guidance scale tells the model how similar the output should be to the prompt.

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

parameters.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

parameters.name: shift

param_schema.title: Shift
param_schema.description: The timestep scheduling shift; shift values higher than 1.0 are better at managing noise in higher resolutions.

parameters.description: The timestep scheduling shift; shift values higher than 1.0 are better at managing noise in higher resolutions.

parameters.name: steps

param_schema.title: Steps
param_schema.description: The number of steps to run the model for (more steps = better image but slower generation. Best results for this model are around 25 steps.)

parameters.description: The number of steps to run the model for (more steps = better image but slower generation. Best results for this model are around 25 steps.)

parameters.name: output_quality

param_schema.title: Output Quality
param_schema.description: Quality of the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality.

parameters.description: Quality of the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality.

parameters.name: negative_prompt

param_schema.title: Negative Prompt
param_schema.description: Things you do not want to see in your image

parameters.description: Things you do not want to see in your image

parameters.name: number_of_images

param_schema.title: Number Of Images
param_schema.description: The number of images to generate

parameters.description: The number of images to generate
